Service Details: - Provides a one-time counselling session free of charge- Individual fills in application and when contacted for an appointment, they can see a counselor for 40 minutes who will then step out to consult with a team- The team approach provides extra perspectives on the individual’s concerns- This is not an ongoing counselling service, but individuals may return again when in need, or may be referred to further community resources- People in crisis will not be asked to wait for appointment
Eligibility: Individuals who want to work on a specific issue in a timely manner who may be experiencing distress from a variety of situations and seeking support or assistance in problem solving
Address & Map: Kelowna Central Health Centre505 Doyle AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 0C5
